CustomField.description: What is the column name in the data file whose data we want to use in the query? If you are trying to find the account id based on the bis id, select Id from Account where BIS_Id__c=100, the name of the column containing the value of 100 should be in this field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: What is the column name in the data file whose data we want to use in the query?
CustomField.label: Data File Column Name
